title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-1.42 - Storage of food removed from original containers or packages
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 14-1.42 - Storage of food removed from original containers or packages

State Regulations

Food removed from the original container or package is to be protected from contamination by storing in clean, covered, sanitized containers maintained at temperatures. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
14-1.42

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
